climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: Web Camera specifically designed and optimized for Professional quality video streaming on social gaming and entertainment sites like Twitch and YouTube

Stream and record vibrant, true-to-life HD 1080P video at 30Fps/ 720P at 60FPS. Compatibility- Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10, macOS X 10.9 or higher, XBox One, Chrome OS, Android v5.0 or above, USB port
Background replacement technology (powered by personify) allows you to integrate your live image and any background Scene, right onto your stream (only works with Windows 7 and above)
Full HD glass lens and premium autofocus deliver razor-sharp, clear video in consistent high Definition while two Built-in mics capture your voice in rich Stereo Audio
Record clear videos even in dim or poorly backlit settings with automatic light Correction.Cable length:5 ft
body.description: Power your online video content with the Logitech C922x Pro Stream Webcam. This HD Camera is more than capable of streaming and recording high quality videos with crystal clear audio, all in your home. Works with OBS (Open Broadcasting Software) XSplit Broadcaster This web camera is specially designed to meet the needs of streamers who like to broadcast on popular websites such as Twitch and YouTube. You need a camera that works fast and well for this, and the C922x is exactly that. It has a full HD lens that records 1080p videos at 30 frames per second and is also capable of 720p resolution at 60 frames per second. You and your viewers can enjoy superior quality that doesn’t lag behind your games. The premium autofocus adjusts to various lighting conditions, whether the glare of a multiple monitor setup or a dimly lit bedroom. The professional quality of this webcam gives you that edge to rise above the rest! Two integrated omnidirectional microphones with noise reduction technology pick up sounds from every direction for a complete video that doesn’t lag.Don’t bore your viewers with the backdrop of a blank wall when they watch your stream – put yourself right in the action with Personify’s background replacement technology. It is incredibly easy to use and doesn’t need a green screen. Integrate your live image hassle free and turn up the heat as you play your favorite games in front of a live internet audience.Breaking through as an online streamer can be challenging if you don’t have the right tools. Logitech helps you get started by giving you a free, six month Xsplit license, whether for fun or professional use. One of the most popular streaming apps today, Xsplit allows you to fine tune all of the different aspects of your live stream, including sound levels, lighting, text overlays, music, graphics, and so much more. This license includes access to both the Broadcaster and Gamecaster apps. Record, edit, and broadcast all of your adventures in the gaming world with Logitech!Compatible with Windows 7 10, Mac OS X 10.9 or later, Chrome OS, and Android v5.0 and above, all you need to start broadcasting is a USB port! Get high quality professional video right out of the box with the Logitech C922x Pro Stream Webcam, your trusted partner for streaming online. Max Resolution: 1080p/30 fps - 720p/ 60 fps.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: C922X Pro Stream Webcam Optimized for streaming and recording Connect with superior clarity every time you go live on channels like Twitch and YouTube. Broadcast your gameplay in 1080p with reliable no-drop audio, autofocus, 78-degree field of view and free 6-month* premium XSplit license.

Full HD 1080p at 30fps/720p at 60fps streaming Stream and record vivid HD 1080p video that captures the most exciting details. Automatic low light correction Stream clear video, even in dim light. Video automatically adjusts to accommodate flickering room lights or multiple computer screens. Includes 6-Month XSplit License Create professional quality live broadcasts with a suite of revolutionary audio/video mixing applications. Adjust screen sizes, music and text. Activate Chroma Key to easily replace the background.

System Requirements Works with Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10, macOS X 10.9 or higher, XBox One, Chrome OS, Android v5.0 or aboveUSB port *The end date varies depending on the product purchase date but is always 6 months after the purchase date.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Logitech C922x Pro Stream Webcam for use on our podcast, The Hunting Quest, and I must say it has exceeded our expectations. The full 1080p HD camera quality is outstanding, providing crisp and clear video for our viewers.One of the standout features of this webcam is its low-light performance, which is essential for our podcasting setup. Even in dimly lit rooms, the C922x delivers impressive image quality, ensuring our audience can always see us clearly.The webcam's built-in dual microphones capture audio with remarkable clarity, reducing the need for additional external microphones. This convenience has improved our podcasting workflow and minimized setup time.Another feature we appreciate is the background removal tool, which allows us to use custom backgrounds during our recordings without the need for a green screen. It's a fun and professional touch that adds a lot of value to our content.The Logitech C922x Pro Stream Webcam is not just a great choice for podcasting but also for live streaming, video conferencing, and content creation. It's versatile, easy to set up, and delivers exceptional performance, making it an excellent investment for anyone looking to enhance their visual presence online. We highly recommend it for podcasters and content creators alike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great price point and quality
reviews.reviewText: simple. easy setup. good video quality. everything works just fine and doesn't break the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great "cheap" cam for streaming
reviews.reviewText: I needed an external webcam for streaming Twitch recently and got this. It's not super cheap, but compared to the others, this one is cheaper and it works really well! Camera quality is good enough for me and you can adjust the angles to your liking. Also, there's no "clipping" or sticking to devices, so that's a plus. I was afraid that was going to limit my placement options, but with the flexible angling it makes it way more convenient to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect starter cam for streams
reviews.reviewText: Started streaming for fun this was the best bang for your buck, the resolution is pretty solid it’s adjustable & very versatile you can hit good angles without it clipping off your monitor easy to set up easy to use the downfall is the sound quality from the mic redlines if you listen to music on a speaker or a sound system for your pc any heavy bass will greatly distort the mic nevertheless a good cam to start with

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for zoom interviews
reviews.reviewText: Even though it’s the same resolution as my built in laptop camera, the quality is much better with this webcam. It has clearer picture and handles lighting well. Works perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stream camera.
reviews.reviewText: The camera does its job just as described. Would recommend for your stream camera. Easy to install set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this camera!
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised at how good this camera makes me look! The picture is clear and takes away any blemishes that I may have. It has a soft light effect. I would definitely recommend this one especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent camera, though I don't use the mic
reviews.reviewText: I have a separate microphone so I don't actually use the mic on this, can't speak to the quality of that. But as an overall webcam it's pretty good. I do like the privacy shutter on it.
Bought the camera for my brother's podcast. It is easy to use and it is good quality. The video look sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: Ideal for green screen and streaming
reviews.reviewText: Ideal for green screen and streaming

reviews.reviewTitle: Webcam working fine and supportive seller
reviews.reviewText: I bought this webcam yesterday and got it on time, now let me share my experience with the camera quality, its up to the mark and well usefull for creating lectures and gaming streams, need some tweaks in softwares setting to make it perfect to reach the expectation level. Go ahead buy it if your need as pro streamer. I also want to share my first experience with amazon seller, i contacted them for some help and clear some dohbts, they help me instant and resolved my all queries. I am happy with my decision and go ahead with this seller for future buy. Recommended it thanks
I bought a used C922 Pro for half the price and just hoping for the best. After it was delivered I tested it right away and everything works fine, lucky no defects in this used product.
Its a decent camera if you have enough lighting.
